name: Swarm
title: Swarm
author: Supercheese
description: Beware the swarm! This mod makes larger biters, spitters, and spawners spawn multiple smaller enemies on death. Now, for instance, killing a medium biter means you have to deal with the small biters that spawn from the medium corpse.
description_original: Beware the swarm! This mod makes larger biters, spitters, and spawners spawn multiple smaller enemies on death. Now, for instance, killing a medium biter means you have to deal with the small biters that spawn from the medium corpse.
